A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In my opinion\, it looks like Star Wars and sounds like Star Wars but it is not Star Wars. I tried really hard to like this movie. No sense in repeating what everyone else has pointed out.  I can say this though...  they took out the main ingredient in Star Wars.... George Lucas. Say what you will about the prequels. They at least exist in the same universe as the original trilogy. This story\, if you can even call it that\, does not even exist in its own trilogy.
